description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Parmi Sub recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rolls,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Chicken Parmi Sub Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place schnitzels on a baking paper-lined oven tray and bake for 18 minutes. Remove and change setting to grill.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan. Add onion and garlic and cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally for 5 minutes or until softened. Stir in passata, basil and sugar. Simmer for 10 minutes or until thickened.
Spread 2 tbs passata sauce over each schnitzel. Top with parmesan (reserving some) and bocconcini. Grill for 3 minutes or until bubbling.
Fill rolls with salad and chicken parmigiana (slice chicken, if necessary). Spoon over a little extra sauce and remaining parmesan.
